meanings.definition: To surpass in finding or discovering.
meanings.sent1: She outfound the hidden treasure in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The detective outfound the criminal's hiding spot.
meanings.sent3: The race to outfound the missing puzzle piece was on!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outfound the truth was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's quest to outfound the ancient ruins was legendary.

meanings.definition: To be discovered or found out.
meanings.sent1: The secret was eventually outfound by her friends.
meanings.sent2: His lie was quickly outfound by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was almost outfound by the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The truth always finds a way to be outfound.
meanings.sent5: The hidden message was cleverly outfound by the codebreaker.
